oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Prayer to the Stars. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-28. 8447-8449). Prayer of the narrators grandfather to the star Canopus. (L VIII.-28. 8452-8458). People pray to the stars so that they will be able to see game (that their dogs will kill for them) on the hunting-ground at night. 1) See also What the stars say, 2) p.8446v: |han=kass'o observed this himself: he heard his maternal grandfather (Tsatsi) talking to the stars, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-28.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prayer to a star
